data.title: Borsao Macabeo
data.description: A flavoursome Summer wine made from the indigenous Macabeo grape in northern Spain. A balanced, modern white with flavours of ripe peach, zesty lemon and nutty undertones, it leaves the palate with a clean and fruity finish.

data.title: Love Shortie All Butter Shortbread
data.description: A rich all butter shortbread, delicately sweet and crumbly with a hint of sea salt, straight out of Scotland.

data.title: Domaine de L'Olibet 'Les Pujols' Cinsault Rose (RRP 9.95GBP)
data.description: A little gem from Saint Georges d’Orques in the south of France. Delicate, sweet spice aromas lead on to a palate of abundant ripe fruit, lifted by a natural zing and finishing with texture and richness. Full of character. 11.5% ABV [France]

data.title: We Are Tea A6 Notes
data.description: We Are Tea A6 Notes

data.title: Rioja Reserva, Baron de Ebro
data.description:
Intriguing notes of vanilla and chocolate make this fruity, full-bodied wine unique. With a long, pleasant finish and woody aroma supporting it, this characterful wine is a good match with beef dishes.
ABV 14%.

data.title: Bantry Bay Chenin Blanc
data.description:
South Africa have adopted the Chenin Blanc grape, and to great effect, showcased in this wine. With delicate floral notes and a subtle pineapple flavour joined by striking lemon and grapefruit notes, it pairs particularly well with seafood. 
ABC 12.5%

data.title: Dolci Colline Prosecco (200ml bottle)
data.description:
Perfect for picnics, parties, or even a long train journey, this pocket-sized prosecco is light, delicate and creamy, with apple, peach, and citrus notes.

Alcohol by Volume (ABV): 11.5%

data.title: Nieto Malbec, Mendoza
data.description: This Argentinian Malbec is incredibly juicy, fresh and tasty! Forty-year-old vines yield concentrated blackberry and plum fruit flavours, with a touch of sweet spice. The palate is silky and warming, with more black fruit and cherries. A great wine with a fresh finish. 13.5% ABV [Argentina]

330ML

data.title: Brighton Bier Pale Ale
data.description:
Brighton Bier’s signature pale ale, this clean and crisp beer is full of big flavours from classic American hops. It's earned a reputation for being a great 'all-rounder' pale ale, even bagging a Gold Medal at the International Beer Challenge in 2015!
4.0% ABV

data.title: Cuvee Jean Paul Rouge
data.description: A classic Southern Rhône red; friendly and warming leafy, autumnal aromas and an ample, baked fruit palate. A delicious, uncomplicated, soft, fruity and very drinkable red. Not to mention winning a couple of awards of previous vintages. 12.5% ABV

data.title: Artesa Rioja Reserva (RRP 12.95GBP)
data.description: A powerful red from high-growing Spanish vines, this deep flavoured wine contains aromas of sweet plum along with a herbal freshness, with flavours of orange peel and clove spice. This is a slightly dry, complex Reserva that works will with a range of meat dishes.

data.title: Montevista Sauvignon Blanc (750ml bottle)
data.description:
From the cooler climes of the Maule Valley comes this Chilean Sauvignon Blanc, with a fresh and lively nose of leafy nettle that diffuses into crisp apple, lemon, and lime notes. Perfect as an aperitif, or as a zingy partner to green salads and shellfish. 

Alcohol by Volume (ABV): 13%

data.description: Let’s face it, a British summer isn’t always sunny… don’t worry though, this cocktail will put a smile on your face, whatever the weather! Inside this kit (for 2 cocktails): 1 unique recipe card, 1 unwaxed lemon, 100ml gordon’s gin, 150ml schweppes, soda water You’ll need: sugar

Alcohol by Volume (ABV): 14%

Potato, milk, cod (fish) (12%), cream (milk), salmon (fish) (9%), smoked haddock (4%) (haddock (fish), salt), butter (milk), fortified wheat flour (wheat flour, calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), water, cheddar cheese (milk), spinach, golden breadcrumbs (fortified wheat flour (wheat flour, calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), yeast, salt, caramelised sugar, sunflower oil, colour paprika extract, turmeric extract), pasteurised free-range egg yolk, salt, parsley, fish stock (cod (fish), potato flakes, salt, fish stock, anchovy (fish), sunflower oil, lemon juice from concentrate, onion powder), lemon juice, ground white pepper.

For cooking instructions see back of pack.
Consume product within use by on top of pack, alternatively freeze before use by date, eat within one month.

data.title: Adobe Chardonnay
data.description: Clear, bright pale yellow in colour, with refreshing citrus aromas of grapefruit and lime that intermingle with subtle tropical fruit aromas. On the palate, it is a balanced, fresh and fruity wine, with velvety texture and a persistent, enjoyable finish. 13.5% ABV

data.title: Boutique Bake Belgian Chocolate Brownie Mix
data.description: Get your bake on with these deliciously decadent brownies. Satisfy your inner-chocoholic with this super simple traybake, and revel in its gloriously gooey centre. Just add eggs and butter.

data.title: Please ignore
data.description: Box 4 Gifting booklet

data.title: Proper Pops Zesty Lemon and Fiery Chilli
data.description: As tasty as they are healthy, these gluten free chips are popped, rather than fried. The result? Low fat, low sugar, and high protein puffs of flavour full of calcium and fibre that come in at only 89 kcal per Proper Pop pot (try saying that quickly!)

data.title: Ca' di Ponti Nero d'Avola, IGT Terre Siciliane (RRP 6.95GBP)
data.description: With full flavours of ripe plum and black cherry and just a hint of bitter chocolate, a nip of tannin and a light smokiness, this modern Sicilian red will pair brilliantly with creamy pasta or meat dishes.

data.title: Makers And Merchants Christmas Chocolate Bauble
data.description: There are few things more Christmassy than baubles and chocolate coins. Makers & Merchants have combined to two in this festive decoration that's contents are as delicious as its appearance is delightful. Perfect as a Christmas stocking filler or tree-hanging treat.

data.title: Belinda Clark Belgian Choc Vanilla Marshmallows
data.description: We always think that Vanilla is the benchmark of flavour - if it's good (and these are) then you can deliver something really special. These vanilla marshmallows are covered in a crisp Belgian chocolate shell- amazing on top of a gourmet hot chocolate!

data.title: Alasia Cortese (750ml bottle)
data.description:
Made by the largest co-operative wine producers in Piemonte, the fresh green apple aromas of the Cortese are uplifted by notes of grapefruit, lime and honeysuckle. Fresh, crisp and lightly honeyed, the mineral note at the end gives each sip a fresh finish.

Alcohol by Volume (ABV): 12%

data.title: BKD Gingerbread Man Biscuit Kit
data.description: BKD's Mini Baking Kit makes yummy gingerbread biscuits - just add golden syrup & butter. Yay! A perfect gift for mini bakers, it has all you need to make 10-15 gingerbread men, including a cookie cutter & edible decorations!

data.title: Green Cuisine Black Peppercorns
data.description: Pepper has been highly prized for thousands of years - in medieval times peppercorns were valued individually as currency! These gourmet peppercorns are native to South India and have a sharp, hot aromatic flavour, perfect for adding a little extra punch to your recipes!

data.title: Joseph Joseph - GoEat Lunch Box
data.description: This may just be the perfect lunch box. Kitted out with two wet food compartments in the top and a larger dry food compartment for the base, the top stores inside when empty, allowing it to be easily stored without taking up much space. It's ideal for storing leftover Gousto recipes!

data.title: Refer a Friend
data.description: RAF leaflet

data.title: Roasted & Salted Pistachios
data.description: Top quality roasted pistachios are hard to beat both as a healthy snack and a flavoursome treat. These ones, from fine food specialists Hider, come lightly salted with their shell on.

data.title: Gordon’s Gin & Slimline Tonic (250ml can)
data.description:
Take the refreshing taste of a Gordan's and Slimline Tonic with you this summer. Perfect for picnics in the park, with just the right balance of G&T everytime.

Ingredients
carbonated water, gordon’s london dry gin, acid: citric acid (E330), flavourings (contain quinine hydrochloride), thickener: glycerine (E422), acidity regulator: trisodium citrate (E331iii), preservative: potassium sorbate (E202), sweetener: sucralose (E955), antioxidant: ascorbic acid (E300), quinine hydrochloride

Nutrition typical Values per 100ml:
energy 125KJ/30Kcal, sodium 23mg, salt 23mg, alcohol 3.95

data.title: Island Bakery Lemon Melts
data.description: Located off the West coast of Scotland on the 3000 person Isle of Mull, The Island Bakery is powered entirely by local and renewable energy - sustainable and scrumptious! These zingy lemon biscuits are dipped in rich white cocolate.

data.title: Hop Stuff Arsenal Pale Ale
data.description: The Arsenal Pale Ale is inspired by Hop Stuff’s birth place on the Royal Arsenal; a genuine craft beer brewed to be enjoyed by all over a few hours. 3.8% ABV

data.title: Grow Your Own Jalapeño Chilli Kit
data.description: This exclusive Grow Your Own Jalapeno Chilli Plant Kit makes the perfect gift for anyone who enjoys cooking with fresh home grown chillies. Whether a keen gardener or someone who enjoys cooking with chilli, there’s nothing more satisfying than growing your own chillies at home!

data.title: Apricot & Strawberry 9 Bar
data.description: 9 Bars are the ultimate taste good, do good breakfast bars. They're vegan, gluten free and packed with seeds and fibre for hours of good energy. This one is absolutely packed with summery apricots and strawberries!

data.title: BKD Zesty Lemon Bunny Cupcakes Baking Kit
data.description: Nothing says family time quite like Easter! So why not use the break to enjoy some fun in the kitchen together? BKD's mini baking kit lets you and the kids create and decorate your very own happy bunny cupcakes - super tasty and super fun!

data.title: Pavillion des Trois Arches Merlot
data.description:
This juicy, full-bodied Merlot is made with grapes from Languedoc region of France. It’s Vin de Pays d’Oc classification allows experimentation, resulting in a style that is smooth, rich and modern. It’s a sumptuous partner to red meats, such as our Spiced Lamb Burger.
ABV 13%

data.title: Yallah House Espresso
data.description: This cafetiere ground, full-bodied single origin coffee hails from Peru. It’s intense, bold and packed full of chocolaty notes and nutty aromas; lending it a versatile richness that works both espresso-style and with milk.

data.title: Pots&Co Chocolate Desserts
data.description: Our customers often say ‘wouldn’t it be great if we offered desserts’? Well that ship’s come in, and this tantalising bite of chocolatey heaven takes no prisoners. Shhh… this special new product is limited to 2 per box... don't tell the kids!

data.title: Iliada Olive Oil
data.description: Go oil the way with Iliada’s authentic PDO extra virgin olive oil, produced from cracking Koroneiki olives in the beautiful Kalamata region of southern Greece. A summer dining essential, lavish it on salads at sultry al fresco soirées.

data.title: Meridian Peanut Bar
data.description: Go nuts for this protein-packed snack, a delicious energy booster that’s perfect for pre or post workouts, or bolting Rocky-style up your local museum steps. Vegan and gluten-free.

data.title: Equal Exchange Chocolate
data.description: A 71% dark chocolate bar blending Peruvian and Dominican cacao beans, this is one for the heavy-weight chocolate enthusiast. Fair-trade and gluten free, it packs in a host of fruity notes and a hint of baked brownie.

data.title: Troffle Handmade Vegan Chocolate Selection
data.description: Chocolatiers -Troffle, have developed a delightful range of hand made chocolates for our vegan customers! A selection of fondant-filled chocolates, handmade in the Chalke Valley using fresh, homegrown ingredients. Troffle's vegan chocolates are a real treat and diary free!

data.title: Bear Dino Paws (for Kids)
data.description: Make healthy snacking adorable and actually appealing to the little ‘uns with these fruity dino paw-shaped treats. They’re made of real fruit, are gluten free and contain no added sugar.

data.title: Equal Exchange Earl Grey Tea
data.description: This ethically soured organic earl-grey blend is floral and fragrant, dainty and delicate. A cup soothes the sense no-end. Notes of citrus and bergamot. Supporting small farmers for fair trade.

data.title: Dark Chocolate & Orange Rice Cakes
data.description: Wholegrain rice cakes, slathered in dark chocolate, with a hint of orange. Feather light, crispy and chocolatey. They tick just about every box going. Hurrah! No artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. Free from gluten, wheat and GM.

data.title: Potato & Rosemary Taralli
data.description: Italians are awesome at food, and their proficiency at baked snacks is no exception. This all natural recipe balances a medley of subtle flavours with a delightfully crumbly texture, creating the perfect all-rounder snack for guzzling Prosecco.

data.title: Theo Randall
data.description: Theo Randall’s ‘My Simple Italian’ contains no less than 100 inspired recipes from the Michelin starred British chef. Simple techniques and elegantly balanced flavours, this book is a must have for those looking to replicate fine Italian dining.

data.title: Pots & Co - Little Pot of Chocolate
data.description: The perfect midweek gluten free treat! This little pot of luxurious chocolate ganache is crafted with the finest 70% Belgian chocolate.

data.title: Sanvigilio Merlot (375 bottle)
data.description:
Ripe, plummy, with just a hint of spice, this medium bodied Italian Merlot perfectly balances soft juicy berries with fresh acid and light herbal notes. Ideal to pair with your Italian favourites, including meat antipasti, pizza, or pasta. 

Alcohol by Volume (ABV): 12.5%

data.title: Pots & Co - Little Pot of Salted Caramel
data.description: When you add a touch of salt to caramel, something delicious and slightly dangerous happens. We’re championing that danger in the name of these gluten free pots of pure chocolate with salted caramel JOY.

data.title: Sipsmith Sloe Gin
data.description: Distilled, award-wining London Dry Gin was left to rest on wild, hand-picked sloe berries to create this warming winter drink; festive redcurrant and ripe winter fruits with exquisite, velvety mouthfeel.

data.title: Baron de Bausaac Carignan
data.description:
Carignan grapes produce wine somewhere between chewy Rioja and nice, juicy Merlot. Our Herby Lamb & Sweet Potato Curry is incomplete without the black cherry notes of this inky ruby red, with hints of sweet vanilla. 

ABV 12%

data.title: Torre Cerere Montepulciano d'Abruzzo (RRP 7.45GBP)
data.description:
Soft and fruity plum flavours in this Italian Montepulciano go beautifully with our tomato pasta recipes, while its juicy blackberry hints hit it off with the savoury, saltier tastes of halloumi dishes. Ripe, ready and deliciously drinkable! 
ABV 12%

data.title: Terrazze della Luna - Rose
data.description: The traditional 'ramato' style of Pinot Grigio rosé, produced exclusively from Pinot Grigio. Careful handling, and a short soak in the press to extract the natural dusky bronze colour of ripe Pinot Grigio grapes, gives a pale, coral pink wine. An elegant and dry rosé. 12.5% ABV

data.title: Beaute du Sud Malbec
data.description:
Steak and Malbec is surely one of the ultimate wine pairings - the firm structure of this French red, along with its deep, inky fruitiness means it works really well with not only meaty dishes, but also strong cheeses and pasta recipes!
ABV 13%

data.title: Fairhall Cliffs Pinot Noir
data.description: Pear, honey, apple, spice and hint of cream with clean acidity, good length and soft texture. Gorgeous with fresh salads and creamy pastas alike!

data.title: Oltre Passo Primitivo
data.description: Deep, dense ruby in colour with aromas of dates, figs and sweet spice, this voluptuous and toasty red hales from Puglia, the heel of Italy's boot and one of Europe's agricultural havens.

data.title: Espirit De Lussac St Emilion
data.description: Fruity, juicy blackberry and blackcurrant flavours with a palate of smoky sandalwood, this is a hearty red built for for hearty meals.

data.title: Claro Reserva Carmenere (RRP 7.95GBP)
data.description: Hailing from Chile, the ideal spot for growing flavour-packed wines, this red is intense garnet in colour with aromas of leather, chocolate, figs, dried plums and black pepper. Perfect with pork! ABV 14%

data.title: Michel Servin Blanc
data.description:
This elegant white wine has a beautiful fresh taste, with a nicely balanced acidity and a long refreshing finish. Aromas of apples and citrus fruit transform into flavours of juicy melon and lemon on the palate. It’s best enjoyed alongside our fish or salad recipes.
ABV 11%

data.title: Saint Desir Sauvignon Blanc
data.description: This Sauvignon Blanc is produced in the Gascony region of Southern France. It’s a citrusy wee number that promises freshness from lemon, limes and green capsicum. It’s clean, bright and fruity all in one.

data.title: Stonebuck Sauvignon Blanc
data.description:
Boldly tropical, this South African Sauvignon Blanc is crying out to be paired with our chicken dishes, beautiful with both tarragon and lime. Grassy, asparagus flavours pack a real punch - Sau good.

ABV 13%

data.title: Montagny Grand Vin de Bourgogne
data.description:
Cool as a cucumber, this French Chardonnay is citrus fresh and dry.  Ripe lemon aromas are perfect with our Smoky Kedgeree & Roast Cherry Tomatoes and oodles of richy fruitiness is to die for with our Teryaki Tofu Noodles.

ABV 13%

data.title: Fathoms Sauvignon Blanc
data.description: Citrus, green grass and elderflower spring from the glass, with a palate of crisp grapefruit and gooseberry. Salads, seafood or and light risottos are ideal with this classic Sauvignon Blanc.

data.title: Biona Organic Caramel Waffles
data.description: These crunchy wholegrain waffles are filled with a sticky sweet caramel. We like to pop them over our cup of tea, so that they start to get a bit melty, before dunking.

data.title: Chocolarder Peruvian Dark
data.description: Decadent and bold, this single origin bar of lusciousness is infused with the caramel and earthy tones of rare, sustainably farmed Criollo beans.

data.title: Pudology- Chocolate Orange Pot (GF) (DF)
data.description: This pot of smooth chocolate orange ganache is made with Brazilian orange oil for a zesty, moreish treat. You might not believe it when you taste it, but it's also dairy and gluten free!

data.title: Chocolarder Gold, Frankincense and Myrrh
data.description: Peruvian, single origin 65% dark chocolate is infused with the warming, distinctive flavours of frankincense and myrrh, and decorated with 22 carat edible gold leaf for extra festivity. Surely the perfect Christmas chocolate bar. Need we say more?

data.title: Chocolarder Caramelised Nibbed Cacao
data.description: Unmistakeable ‘raw’ tastes and textures from nibbed Peruvian cacao beans, caramelised and folded through single origin dark chocolate - a whiskey flavour with crunch.

data.title: Peppermongers Black Pepper
data.description: Organically grown, hand-harvested and sun-dried in the hills of the Western Ghats, India, Tellicherry is the highest quality black pepper in the world. Only the fruitiest, largest 10% of peppercorns make the grade!

data.title: Cocowel Coconut Oil
data.description: 100% natural coconut oil, cold pressed for great flavour. A super-healthy alternative to butter. Unrefined, unbleached and unbelievably good!

data.title: Clearspring Tamari Roast Sicilian Almonds
data.description: A tasty multi-tasker, these organic, gluten-free almonds can be casually munched upon as a healthy straight-from-the-pack snack, or elegantly scattered as a garnish for soups, salads & desserts.

data.title: Soffle's Pitta Chips
data.description: It’s crunch time! These pita crisps are clever, very clever. They haven’t gone near a deep-fat-fryer, yet somehow manage to tick all the same satisfaction factors as regular crisps. Little triangles of pure joy, oven-roasted with olive oil and rosemary.

data.title: Mr. Filbert's Moroccan Spiced Almonds
data.description: Mr Filbert’s snacks are hot-air roasted and hand-tumbled in 100% natural ingredients. This versatile almond, chilli, mint, cumin and garlic flavour is brilliant crushed over crumble or curry!

data.title: Mr. Filbert's French Rosemary Almonds
data.description: Bittersweet, fragrant rosemary with Mr Filbert's air-roasted, hand-tossed almonds - simple delicate, award-winning flavour. Crush over salads for extra punch and crunch!

data.title: Mr. Filbert's Christmas Nuts
data.description: Gousto HQ are going nuts for these hot-air roasted, 100% natural snacks. Perfect for sharing this Christmas, these cranberry and orange mixed nuts will be a seasonal sensation!

data.title: Knacks 5 Seed Crispbread Bites
data.description: These crispbread bites are baked to perfection and seasoned with FIVE different healthy seeds: linseed, sunflower, poppy, pumpkin and chia. Ex-seed-ingly tasty!

data.title: Raw Chocolate Raisins
data.description: Plump, juicy, sun-drenched Californian raisins draped in pure, rich, raw chocolate created from virgin cacao butter and coconut palm sugar. X-rated raisins!

data.title: Nakd Banana Bread Multipack
data.description: A little piece of sunshine, smooshed into a bar. Fresh, moist and wonderfully soft banana with a hint of walnut and cinnamon, it’s 100% natural. Nature knows best!

data.title: Snowflake Brownie Kit
data.description: Teaming up with the wonderful chaps over at BakedIn, we’ve created a little stocking-filler complete with child-friendly recipe card, tools to make an icing sugar template and a mind-boggling, festive word puzzle to while away the baking time…

data.title: Chocolate Mug Brownie
data.description: Just add butter and water, pop in the microwave and behold! A velvety Belgian chocolate brownie miracle in a mug.

data.title: Mistletoe
data.description: Tenbury Wells is known as the Capital of English Mistletoe and it's from here that ours hails, having been harvested from among beautiful organic orchards. Merry Christmas!

data.title: Gousto Veg Brush
data.description: The trouble with farm-fresh potatoes is that they bring some of the farm with them. Luckily, this nifty brush is just the trick for scrubbing them up to a dapper finish.

data.title: Gousto Tote Bag
data.description: Santa’s sack! Tired of ferrying your Christmas shopping around in lack-lustre shopping bags? Wish they were a bit more Gousto? Enter the Gousto tote bag; a fetching reusable bag you’ll want to be seen with.

data.title: Joseph Joseph - Chop2Pot, Chopping Board
data.description: This cutting board really is a cut above. It has a special knife­friendly textured board, and folds to form a chute, allowing you to transfer your prep straight into the pan. It also boasts non-­slip feet for grip.

data.title: Joseph Joseph  - Easy-Press Garlic Crusher
data.description: We’ve got a new crush. This 2-piece garlic crusher comes complete with a handy in-built scraping tool - you don’t even need to peel! It washes easily too, thanks to special cone­-shaped holes.

data.title: Dilly & Wolf - Wasabi & Horseradish Roasted Peas
data.description: "British Roasted. Globally Inspired" - that's our kind of food! These Super Snacks are made with British-grown pulses and top quality ingredients, and that's it; nothing artificial is used to create their flavours - sometimes keeping it simple makes a superb snack!

data.title: Joseph Joseph - Elevate Steel Tongs
data.description: These super tongs put hygiene first - an innovative weighted handle with integrated tool rest keeps mess at bay. Gently spring-loaded and comfortable to hold, they're heat resistant up to a smoking 270ºC.

data.title: Troffle Handmade Chocolates - British Puddings
data.description: Troffle's new Winter range is inspired by classic British puddings, with everything from Sticky Toffee to Gingerbread. All the chocolates are handmade using fresh ingredients and there are 9 different flavours to try, including the Great Taste Award winning Madagascan Single Origin Ganache.

data.title: Joseph Joseph - Twist Grater, Coarse and Fine
data.description: Ever find preparing carrots or cheese a little...grating? This microplane changes everything. Two sets of stainless steel, razor sharps blades promise a swift and easy grate every time!

data.title: Joseph Joseph - Multi-peel
data.description: Ergonomic easy-grip handle and in-built scraper for muddy veg, this multi-faceted multi-peel even has a handy potato eye remover. Now that's a-peel-ing!

data.title: Joseph Joseph - Nest Measure
data.description: Compact measuring spoon set ranging from little (¼ tsp) to large (up to 250 ml). Snap-together for space-saving storage!

data.title: Joseph Joseph - Citrus Catcher
data.description: Keep the pips out of your juicing efforts with this clever little adaptation of a classic reamer. The secret? A special cup catching debris while the liquid runs merrily through. Ext-ream-ly handy!

data.title: Gousto Gift Card
data.description: If you love our recipes, give the gift of Gousto to a friend! Our gift cards, worth 3 meals for 2 people, are a great present for food lovers and kitchen novices alike. N.B. For new customers only, gift cards must be redeemed within 90 days of purchase.

data.title: Bramley Hand Wash and Hand Cream Set
data.description: Bramley uses 100% natural ingredients, just like us. This beautiful set includes full-size bottles of revitalising lavender, orange and geranium hand wash and nourishing aloe vera, grapefruit and cocoa butter hand cream. Sumptuous scrubbing!

data.title: Joseph Joseph - Twist 2 in 1 Whisk
data.description: Joseph Joseph are masters of combining stylish design and great functionality. With a twistable handle which transforms it from a balloon to a flat whisk, and easily dismantling parts for effortless cleaning, this is a whisk worth taking!

data.title: Gu Chocolate Ganache Pot (50g)
data.description:
These chocolate ganache pots from Gu Puds will satisfy any need for rich and velvety chocolate as a little treat or after dinner.

May contain: hazelnut and almonds.

data.title: Gift flyer
data.description: Gift flyer

data.title: Cotton tote bag
data.description: Cotton tote bag

data.title: Joe & Seph's White Choc & Strawberry Gourmet Popcorn
data.description: Treat yourself with this delicious handmade caramel, white chocolate and strawberry flavoured gourmet popcorn. Joe & Seph's popcorn is handmade in London by a small team of pastry chefs using the highest quality, 100% natural ingredients.

data.title: Iced Cinnamon Bun Baking Kit
data.description: Just add butter and milk for 12 luxury buns of silky cinnamon bliss. Swirls of pure heaven, created by Michel Roux OBE; a sweet classic for you to bake from scratch.

data.title: Beavertown Neck Oil Session IPA
data.description:
Inspired by Beavertown founder Logan's love of a Best Bitter from the Black Country, this easy going IPA first started life as a home-brew. It's great when sipped and appreciated, but just as good as a reliable, casual drink. 
ABV 4.3% 
330ML

data.title: Tabali Pedregoso Cabernet Sauvignon
data.description:
Aged for 10 months in oak barrels this wine is pure class, deliciously dark with blackcurrant and black pepper. Now 4 years old its worth every penny picking up awards in 2016 and 2017 for this vintage.
14% ABV

data.title: Domaine de Vedilhan Viognier, Pays d'Oc
data.description: This elaborate and textured white wine combines notes of Turkish delight and tropical fruit including mango, pineapple and peach, and also bitter-sweet crystallised orange peel. The Viognier grapes also add a hint of bitter almonds to this memorable wine.

data.title: Organic Seed & Bean Sea Salt & Lime (85g)
data.description:
Never thought to dive into a fruity lime, slightly salty and creamy chocolate bar before? Like an exotic cocktail in the sunshine, nothing hits the spot quite like it. Take the plunge!

Ingredients
sugar, cocoa butter, milk powder, cocoa mass, vanilla, lime, sea salt.

Nutrition typical Values per 100g:
Energy 2,398KJ/576Kcal, fat 38.4g of which saturates 23.1g, carbohydrates 49.5g  of which sugars 48.7g, dietary fibre 1.8g, protein 7.2g, salt 0.02g.

Allergens: milk.

May contain: peanut, soy, milk, nut. Produced on a site that handles peanuts, soy, milk and nuts.

data.title: Sweet Chilli Rice Noodles
data.description: ilumi know how to make noodley goodness taste great. Just add boiling water and in 4 minutes you'll have vegetarian Sweet Chilli Rice Noodles with a sweet, spicy chilli, red pepper, spring onion and jalapeno pepper sauce. They're gluten-free, milk-free but most importantly FULL of flavour.

data.title: Microplane Premium Zester/Grater
data.description: This zester is slender, practical and durable. Made of strong stainless steel which suits any kitchen, it is equipped with a protective cover, comfortable soft touch handle and two rubber anti-slip feet. There's no excuse not to be able to add some tang to every recipe.

data.title: Choc on Choc White Belgian Chocolate Sprouts
data.description: It wouldn't be Christmas without some Brussels sprouts, but if your taste for all things Belgian is more cocoa-related, then we've got some great news for you! Handcrafted in Somerset and carefully died to look just like the real thing, these chocolate veggies are the best Christmas present!

data.title: Joseph Joseph - Dot Active 750ml (Grey)
data.description: Want to track your water intake? You can track up to 4 bottles per day with the Dot Active bottle. Designed with an ultra clever lid technology, every time you refill and screw the lid back on, a new dot appears to represent a bottle you finished. Genius!

data.title: Cape Heights Merlot (RRP 7.95GBP)
data.description: A plump and rich Merlot from the tip of South Africa, this deep red wine has juicy flavour notes of hedgerow fruits with a gently leafy finish. It's a great companion for our beef and lamb dishes.

data.title: Cashew & Cocoa 9 Bar
data.description: 9 Bars are the ultimate taste good, do good breakfast bars. They're vegan, gluten free and packed with seeds and fibre for hours of good energy. This bar contains cashews and cocoa for a rich, satisfying flavour.

data.title: Aires Andinos Malbec
data.description:
From the Mendoza region of Argentina, this is a gorgeous, intense wine with a deep red hue and a long, juicy aftertaste. It's great with beef dishes. 
ABV 12.5%.

data.title: Knock Knock Shiraz
data.description: We love a bit of superstition – to knock on wood is meant to ensure good luck... and you're in luck with this blockbuster Barossa Valley Shiraz. Dense sweet blackberry fruits on the nose, with a lovely, savoury, almost meaty character and hints of black pepper. 14% ABV [Australia]

data.title: Oltre Passo Falanghina
data.description: Tingling taste buds with it's rounded lemon zest, this refreshing white wine also offers a touch of peach and apricot. A perfect treat which is best shared! ABV 12.5%

data.title: Serious Pig Classic Snacking Salami
data.description: Serious Pig take their snacks...seriously. This classic snacking salami made with British pork has won a Great Taste Award for its delicious seasoned pork flavour that gets straight to the point - seriously good charcuterie.

data.title: Joseph Joseph - GoEat Snack Pot
data.description: Another super-efficient creation from the brainboxes at Joseph Joseph, this nifty snack pot is the perfect way to store leftover sauces, dips or a snack for when you're on the go. Leak-proof, with a lockable lid and two separate compartments, this little pot is a LOT practical!

data.title: Le Voleur de Vin Blanc
data.description: Le Voleur de Vin A.K.A The Wine Thief frequents only the finest establishments. They may be well known, but their cellars are the best kept secrets on the Rue Montorgueil. But the real crime - well - that would be to not to enjoy the spoils with your close circle of friends. 11.5% ABV

data.title: Michel Servin Rouge
data.description:
Soft, ripe and jammy, with fruity blackcurrant and red berry notes alongside a muscular texture makes this a robust, well balanced French wine.
ABV 11.5%.

data.title: Chocolat Noir & Gold Dust Macaron Baking Kit
data.description: This is truly the first macaron baking kit of its kind, housed in a sumptuously embellished tin, you'll find it a joy to unwrap the contents! Practically everything you need to make 24 beautiful macarons, a great gift for any budding pâtissière.

data.title: Hilltop Blossom Honey (340g)
data.description:
Hilltop blossom honey is the perfect addition to your breakfast, bakes and everything in between!

Simply drizzle over porridge, marinade your meat, add sweetness to your sauces and salad dressings – or get creative, why not try in your curry?

data.title: BKD Vanilla Bean Little Chick Biscuits Baking Kit
data.description: Incredibly cute - these Little Chick Biscuits are easy to bake and fun to decorate. Fuelling kids' imaginations, time spent in the kitchen  doesn't get more exciting than this. The yummiest vanilla biscuits, they'll go down a treat with the entire family!

data.title: Wanderlust 'Marlborough' Sauvignon Blanc
data.description: 'Wanderlust' is the uncontrollable desire to hit the road and venture out to discover amazing things. That's exactly what this represents – a classic, bright and vibrant Marlborough Sauvignon, perfumed with nettle and lime. You'll also notice ripe tropical fruits and a rich minerality. 13% ABV [NZ]

data.title: Yeastie Boys Bigmouth Session IPA
data.description: Bigmouth is an extra pale, unfiltered hoppy session ale with tropical and white wine notes. Made using hops from Nelson, New Zealand, this ale has a tantalising, lively flavour and dry aftertaste making it a truly memorable tipple. 4.4% ABV

data.title: Pomegranate Pleaser Cocktail Kit
data.description:
You'll fall in love with the refreshing tartness of this pomegranate molasses, gin and lemon juice concoction!
Inside this kit (for 2 cocktails): 1 unique recipe card, 1 unwaxed lemon, 100g pomegranate molasses, 100ml gordon’s gin, 150ml schweppes soda water

data.title: Guinness Draught (440ml can)
data.description:
Established in 1759, nothing quite compares to a smooth, velvety and perfectly balanced pint of iconic Guinness. Here's to sweet and balanced malty flavour with great company. Sláinte!

Ingredients
water, malted barley, barley, roast barley, hops, nitrogen.

Nutrition typical Values per 100ml:
energy 148KJ/35Kcal, carbohydrate 2.7g, of which sugars 0.25g, protein 0.3g, sodium <0.01g, salt <0.01g, ABV 4.2%.

data.title: Joseph Joseph - Mezzaluna
data.description: The mezzaluna (meaning ‘half moon’ in Italian) is a staple utensil in Mediterranean kitchens. Used for hassle-free herb chopping, we’re over the (half) moon with Joseph Joseph’s modern, foldable design, allowing it to be easily and safely stored.

data.title: Sierra Grande Merlot
data.description: Great food wine, serve with a juicy steak, savoury lamb casseroles, herby sausages or a char-grilled vegetable lasagne. Oh and this wine has won 3 awards in the last 4 vintages including 2017. You wont want to stop drinking this one. 12.5% ABV

data.title: Troffle Handmade Chocolate Signature Selection
data.description: Chocolatiers, Troffle, promise melt-in-your-mouth indulgence with it’s Handmade Signature Chocolate Selection. Warming, wintry chocolates filled with crunchy honeycomb, smooth caramel and rich ganache – you have no choice but to fall in love with them!

data.title: Moor Nor' Hop Pale Ale
data.description:
A beer so popular it won a beer festival and sold out within just 2 weeks of first being released, the ultra-pale Nor' Hop ale has (thankfully) now been made a permanent beer of the Somerset-based Moor Beer Company.  
ABV 4.1% 
330ML

data.title: Superbake Joy Makers Brownie Mix
data.description: Get your bake on with these brownies made with natural organic ingredients and maca powder. Vegan, gluten-free and dairy free. One pack makes 12 - 15 brownies.
